main.name: Bilal Ahmed
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Senior Software Engineer
about.summary: Senior Software Engineer with over 5+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and optimizing high-performance, scalable web applications. Skilled in building secure, reliable systems using modern technologies including React, Node.js, ASP.NET Core, .NET, C#, PostgreSQL, and AWS. Adept at writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following industry best practices and modern design patterns. Experienced in working within agile environments and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software that aligns with business goals and enhances user experience. Passionate about solving complex technical problems, improving development workflows, and continuously learning new tools and technologies to drive innovation and productivity.
currentFocus: Building and improving scalable full-stack applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and ASP.NET Core
Enhancing backend performance through caching, indexing, optimized database queries, and efficient .NET services
Designing reliable REST and GraphQL APIs following MVC and microservice-ready architectures
Improving UI components for better usability, accessibility, and responsiveness across web platforms
Managing cloud deployments using AWS, Vercel, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines for both Node.js and .NET-based applications
achievements: Delivered 10+ production-ready full-stack projects for global clients using React, Node.js, and ASP.NET Core MVC
Automated complex workflows and reduced manual effort by up to 40% through custom dashboards and admin panels
Improved backend API performance by up to 60% using caching strategies, optimized queries, and efficient .NET services
Led end-to-end development and deployment of multiple client products following MVC best practices and modern web architectures
Deployed scalable and cost-efficient systems using AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, and CloudWatch for both .NET and JavaScript stacks

desc: Gained a strong foundation in computer science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering.
Completed projects on web development, database management, and mobile app development.
Participated in tech seminars and coding competitions, improving problem-solving and teamwork skills.
Led architecture and development of scalable full-stack applications using NestJS, ASP.NET Core, GraphQL, and React.
Designed and maintained secure REST and GraphQL APIs using .NET and Node.js following MVC and clean architecture principles.
Implemented microservices using Docker, Kafka, and RabbitMQ, improving system reliability and throughput.
Optimized CI/CD pipelines for both .NET and Node.js services using Docker, GitHub Actions, and AWS.
Managed cloud infrastructure on AWS with a strong focus on scalability, security, and cost efficiency.
Implemented unit and integration testing across JavaScript and C# codebases to ensure quality and maintainability.
Mentored junior developers, promoted engineering best practices, and improved team productivity.
Collaborated with product, design, and QA teams to deliver features aligned with business goals.
Developed and maintained scalable full-stack web applications using NestJS and ASP.NET Core.
Built RESTful APIs using .NET MVC and GraphQL services to improve performance, flexibility, and data access.
Integrated React-based frontends with backend services built in Node.js and C#.
Managed AWS infrastructure including S3, EC2, and cloud security best practices.
Automated CI/CD pipelines for JavaScript and .NET applications, reducing deployment time and improving delivery reliability.
Troubleshot and optimized existing applications to enhance backend performance and user experience.
Developed backend services using ASP.NET Core and C#, following MVC and clean architecture principles.
Built scalable applications using NestJS and Node.js with a strong focus on maintainable system design.
Designed and implemented microservices using Apache Kafka for real-time, event-driven communication.
Optimized PostgreSQL and MongoDB schemas and queries across .NET and Node.js services to improve performance.
Managed AWS infrastructure with an emphasis on scalability, security, and cost optimization.
Automated CI/CD pipelines, significantly accelerating the release and deployment process.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to engineering best practices and system design discussions.
